name: unlock_new_element_data
data: Move only in the shown direction
Remove all blocks of the chosen color
Clear below to break the ice
Only star blocks enter star doors. Tip: Normal blocks can follow too!
Clear the bomb before it explodes!
Paired blocks move together. Clear one to split
Remove same-color scissors to cut ropes!
Doors switch open/close after each move. Tip: Go through when open!
Drag only same-color blocks onto the path!
Clear below to break the ice
